m_szDocTitle: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR FINANCIING COMMUNITY SHARED VEHICLES BASED ON AMENITY VALUE OF SHARED VEHICLE PROGRAMS - Nissan North America, Inc.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR FINANCIING COMMUNITY SHARED VEHICLES BASED ON AMENITY VALUE OF SHARED VEHICLE PROGRAMS United States Patent Application 20150278943 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: Methods and systems provide a derivative financing product for a community shared vehicle program by establishing a line of credit for each participating home to pay for the community shared vehicle program. The line of credit derives value from both tangible and intangible values of the community shared vehicle program. The line of credit is established by estimating a
